rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
input: sentence: I found a python book., word: python
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single part-of-speech tag, 'NN', which is present in the list of allowed tags in the description. The output does not contain any extraneous information and adheres to the requirement of returning only the tag.
OK
